title: AI predicts health outcomes for premature newborns from blood samples
description: An artificial intelligence-based tool can predict the medical trajectories of individual premature newborns from blood samples collected soon after they are born, a Stanford Medicine-led study has shown.
content:
An artificial intelligence-based tool can predict the medical trajectories of individual premature newborns from blood samples collected soon after they are born, a Stanford Medicine-led study has shown.

title: Surging memory chip prices dim outlook for consumer electronics makers
description: The rapid build-out of artificial intelligence infrastructure by U.S. tech firms such as OpenAI, Alphabet-owned Google and Microsoft has absorbed much of the world's memory chip supply, pushing up prices as manufacturers prioritize components for higher-margin data centers over consumer devices.

title: Tencent Cloud at Davos: Unlocking AI for all, Bringing Value within Reach
description: DAVOS, Switzerland, Jan. 22, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- At the Annual Meeting of World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Dowson Tong, Senior Executive Vice-President of Tencent and CEO of Tencent Cloud and Smart Industries Group, emphasized that the real-world value of artificial intelligence is further unlocked when open ecosystems empower consumers and enterprises to choose from a diversity of large models tailored to specific, real-life applications.

title: YouTube Will Soon Let Creators Make Shorts Using Their AI Likeness
description: But YouTube CEO Neal Mohan says artificial intelligence will be a "tool for expression," not a replacement for human creativity.

title: Forrester picks holes in IT’s AI story, says just 10
description: Despite the brouhaha, most artificial intelligence projects in Indian IT services firms are failing to deliver sustained results. Research firm Forrester says only 10-15% of AI projects make it into long-term production use, though companies claim rapid adoption across their operations.

title: Critics, pollsters warn Canadians are wary of AI, want government to set guardrails
description: The federal government is set to launch its new national artificial intelligence strategy soon — but critics say it hasn’t done enough to listen to Canadians and pollsters are warning that a skeptical public wants the government to put rules in place.
content: The federal government is set to launch its new national artificial intelligence strategy soon — but critics say it hasn’t done enough to listen to Canadians and pollsters are warning that a skeptical public wants the government to put rules in place... [7628 chars]

title: Apple reportedly revamping Siri as company's 'first artificial intelligence chatbot' - and it 'will go well beyond the abilities of the current Siri'
description: A new report reveals Apple plans to build a new AI chatbot that will eventually replace Siri.
content: We've been waiting for an overhauled Siri for nearly two years, but Apple may already be developing a Siri 3.0 that could debut in late 2026. According to a new report from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple is in the process of building a new chatbot — ... [3378 chars]
